channel.title: Binary Search on 郭玉晨的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Binary Search on 郭玉晨的博客

item.title: LeetCode 718. Maximum Length of Repeated Subarray
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: Description Given two integer arrays A and B, return the maximum length of an subarray that appears in both arrays. Example 1: Input: A: [1,2,3,2,1] B: [3,2,1,4,7] Output: 3 Explanation: The repeated subarray with maximum length is [3, 2, 1]. Note: 1 <= len(A), len(B) <= 1000 0 <= A[i], B[i] < 100 Solutions 动态规划 问题定义： dp[i][j

item.title: LeetCode 378. Kth Smallest Element in a Sorted Matrix
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: 之前写过LeetCode 74: Search a 2-D matrix和LeetCode 240: Search a 2-D matrix II这两题，当时提到了这一题。这里要说的这一题的两种解法分别是klo

item.title: LeetCode 300. Longest Increasing Subsequence
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: 674. Longest Continuous Increasing Subsequence 与 LeetCode 300. Longest Increasing Subsequence 是两道递增子串的问题。 LeetCode 674. Longest Continuous Increasing Subsequence 这一题是一题简单题，只需要在每一个位置判断是否破坏了递增，破坏了则从长度为1开始重来

item.title: LeetCode 240: Search a 2D matrix II
item.author: gycggd@gmail.com (Guo, Yuchen)
item.description: Leetcode中有许多关于Sorted Matrix的题目，非常有意思，其中Search 2-D matrix算是最简单的了。 后面还有378. Kth Smallest Element
